## TypedSchema type

**Signature:**

```typescript
type TypedSchema<TTables extends readonly TableBuilderWithColumns<TableSchema>[]> = {
    tables: {
        readonly [K in TTables[number]['schema']['name']]: Extract<TTables[number]['schema'], {
            name: K;
        }>;
    };
};
```
